revision.text:
{{Infobox Oak Item |name = Amulet Coin |image = [[File:Bag_Amulet_Coin_Sprite.png]] |caption = Artwork of the ''Amulet Coin''. |dex = 30 |effect = Gain more coins from Battling }} The '''Amulet Coin''' is an [[Oak Items|Oak Item]]. When equipped, it increases the amount of money gained. It notably does not affect {{pdollar}} earnings in dungeons, but affects earnings in most other situations. The Amulet Coin is unlocked after catching 30 unique Pokémon. == Details == {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Level !! Effect !! Upgrade Requirements !! Upgrade Cost |- |0 || x1.25 Coins Earned || 500 defeated Pokémon || style="text-align:right" | 50,000 {{pdollar}} |- |1 || x1.3 Coins Earned || 500 defeated Pokémon || style="text-align:right" | 100,000 {{pdollar}} |- |2 || x1.35 Coins Earned || 1500 defeated Pokémon || style="text-align:right" | 250,000 {{pdollar}} |- |3 || x1.4 Coins Earned || 2500 defeated Pokémon || style="text-align:right" | 500,000 {{pdollar}} |- |4 || x1.45 Coins Earned || 5000 defeated Pokémon || style="text-align:right" | 1,000,000 {{pdollar}} |- |5/Max || x1.5 Coins Earned || N/A || style="text-align:right" | N/A |- |}
{{Oak items}}
[[Category:Oak Items]] [[Category:Items]]
